query.statement:
SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT , '' AS FLAG , A.DOCNO AS DOCNO , A.DOCKIND AS DOCKIND , A.APPGUBN AS APPGUBN , A.SEQNO AS SEQNO , A.SEQSTAT AS SEQSTAT , A.APDPT1 AS APDPT1 , A.APDPT1_N AS APDPT1_N , A.APNUM AS APNUM , A.APRNK AS APRNK , A.APIRUM AS APIRUM , A.APDATE AS APDATE , A.APTIM AS APTIM , A.APDESC AS APDESC , CASE WHEN VALUE(D.UPN,'') > '' THEN VALUE(E.CS121_SPT,'') ELSE VALUE(C.ZSITE_NM,'') END AS SPT , CASE WHEN VALUE(D.UPN,'') > '' THEN VALUE(E.CS121_UPN,'') ELSE VALUE(C.POSID,'') END AS PJT , CASE WHEN VALUE(D.UPN,'') > '' THEN (SELECT CASE MAX(GBU) WHEN '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' ELSE 'Çù·Â»ç' END FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND UPN = VALUE(D.UPN,'') AND CST = VALUE(D.CST,'') AND HST <> 'D') ELSE (SELECT CASE MAX(GBU) WHEN '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' ELSE 'Çù·Â»ç' END FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PJT = VALUE(B.PJT,'') AND HST <> 'D') END GBU FROM SAPHEE.ZWBAP02 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS643_DOC DOC, MAX(CS643_PJT) PJT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST643 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS643_DOC = #DOCNO# GROUP BY CS643_DOC ) B ON B.DOC = A.DOCNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 C ON C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND C.POSID = B.PJT LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS643_DOC DOC, MAX(CS643_UPN) UPN, MAX(CS643_CST) CST FROM SAPHEE.ZCST643 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS643_DOC = #DOCNO# GROUP BY CS643_DOC ) D ON D.DOC = A.DOCNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 E ON E.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND E.CS121_UPN = D.UPN AND E.CS121_CST = D.CST AND D.UPN > '' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.DOCNO = #DOCNO# AND A.DOCKIND = #DOCKIND#
ORDER BY A.MANDT, A.DOCNO, A.DOCKIND, A.APPGUBN, A.SEQNO DESC FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
